Title: Taka no Tsume-dan Yoshida Presents "Sengoku Taiga" no Susume
Description: ['A collaboration between Eagle Talon and the mobile game ', Sengoku Taiga, ". Yoshida is playing the game and suddenly becomes Yukimura while the Chancellor becomes Ieyasu. Yoshida explains the game mechanics and Chancellor is ecstatic that Yoshida's advice for battle tactics help him defeat Deluxe Fighter's character in the game. Yoshida continues to talk about a special event running from April 24, 2019 - May 8, 2019."]
